meaningInfo: You keep checking outside to see if they have stopped, but they are still drinking. They haven't stopped yet.
readingMnemonic: The animal with horns that is <kanji>still</kanji> drinking your alcohol is no animal at all. It is actually one of the local <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>) dressed up like a horned animal so they can drink as long as they want and you'll be too scared to shoo them away.
readingInfo: You keep checking, but that youth is still drinking. Of course, you don't know they are a youth, so it's quite impressive an animal can drink this much.
